com.esri.mo2.cs.geod
Class PointTransformerImpl

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.cs.geod.PointTransformerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PointTransformer
public class PointTransformerImpl
extends Object
implements PointTransformer

Implements a point transformer, an augmention of points within lines so that the desired line is always within a specified accuracy value. For example if a line specified by two points in a given coordinate system is converted to another system, the new line may be actually some sort of ellipsoidal curve. The augmenter will create the new line with enough points to represent it within a specified accuracy. This avoids the simplistic and inaccurate technique of arbitrarily adding points to a line so that you can project it properly. Thus the augmenter adds only enough points to satisfy the accuracy. On the other hand this allows one to zoom in on an ellipsoidal line infinitely. An instantiation is meant to be used serially within the graphics pipeline as it reuses the x, y arrays internally.
